nameJP: フリードリヒ・デア・グローセ
name: Friedrich der Große

1.name: Symphony of Destruction
1.description: When taking damage or when an enemy enters the defensive firing line, trigger an armor piercing barrage from the secondary weapon (firepower increased by skill level) and enter a 15 second cooldown

2.name: Sonata of Chaos
2.description: When main gun is fired an odd numbered of times, increase reload by 30-50% and damage by 10-20%. When main gun is fired an even number of times, increase critical chance by 10-20% and critical damage by 20-50%. Effects gained persist until the main gun is fired again

3.name: Rhapsody of Darkness
3.description: When health is between 70-100%, increase firepower by 10-20%. When health is between 30-70%, increase firepower by 4-10% and reduce damage taken by 4-10%. When health drops below 30%, reduce damage taken by 10-20%

4.name: Siren Killer Ⅰ
4.description: Increase damage done to sirens by 5%

strengthenLevel.level10: Main Gun+1 | Main Gun Efficiency+5% | Limit Break ★★★★☆☆
strengthenLevel.level20: Secondary Gun+2 | Main Gun Efficiency+10% | Limit Break ★★★★★☆
strengthenLevel.level30: Main Gun+1 | Main gun Efficiency+15% | Limit Break ★★★★★★

1.japanese: 戦艦・フリードリヒ・デア・グローセ

2.chinese: 铁血海军腓特烈大帝号战列舰，H计划的产物之一。我的孩子，如果失眠的话，就让我为你唱首摇篮曲吧
2.chineseTL: Ironblood battleship Friedrich der Große, one of the products from the H Plan. My child, if you feel sleepless, let me sing you a lullaby
2.japanese: 鉄血海軍、戦艦フリードリヒ・デア・グローセ、H級戦艦の計画型。さあ、ボウヤ…寝付けないなら、子守唄を奏でてあげるわ
2.english: I am Friedrich der Große, prototype H-class battleship of the Iron Blood Navy. Come, my child... If you are unable to sleep, allow me to play you a lullaby.

3.chinese: 欢迎你的到来，我的孩子，你希望我赠予你什么？黄金、荣耀，还是青春？
3.chineseTL: Welcome, my child. What do you wish for? Riches, glory, or eternal youth?
3.japanese: ようこそ私の元へ。ボウヤ、なにがお望み？富？栄誉？それとも永遠なる青春？
3.english: You've returned to my side once more, my child. Tell me, what is it that you wish for? Wealth? Glory? Or perhaps eternal youth?

4.chinese: 快拉开今日的帷幕吧，奏者们早已急不可耐了！
4.chineseTL: Let's open today's curtain, the performers are getting impatient!
4.japanese: 奏者たちはもうお待ちかねだわ！さあ、今宵の戦幕を上げてごらん！
4.english: The performers can wait no longer! Hurry, let us raise the curtains of battle!

5.chinese: 我的孩子，若想取得彻底的胜利，必须保持绝对的理性
5.chineseTL: My child, if you wish to achieve complete victory, you must maintain absolute rationality
5.japanese: ボウヤ、絶対なる勝利を得るには、絶対なる理性が必要よ
5.english: My child, if you desire absolute victory, you must maintain absolute rationality.

6.chinese: 战斗时压抑的感情，就在演奏中释放出来吧
6.chineseTL: The emotions suppressed during combat, let's release them during our performance
6.japanese: 戦闘中に抑えつけた激情など、この調べを聞いて解き放つがいいわ
6.english: All those emotions that you’ve bottled up through all those conflicts... Listen to my concert, and let it all out.

7.chinese: 战场上的我理性得几近残酷？我姑且把它当做一种夸奖吧
7.chineseTL: My level of rationality approaches cruelty in the battlefield? I will consider it a compliment
7.japanese: 戦場の私は残酷に見える？フフフ…褒め言葉として受け取ってあげるわ
7.english: My appearance upon the battlefield gives off an air of cruelty? Hehe... I’ll take that as a compliment.

8.chinese: 即便不小心惹怒了我，只要好好道歉，我还是会原谅你的
8.chineseTL: If you carelessly anger me, as long as you apologize, I will forgive you
8.japanese: 私を怒らせても、ちゃんと謝れば許してあげるわ
8.english: Even should you anger me, I’ll forgive you as long as you properly apologize.

9.chinese: 害怕的时候，就躲到我身后吧
9.chineseTL: When afraid, just hide behind me
9.japanese: 恐怖で身を震わせるときは私の後ろに居るべきね
9.english: If you are ever afraid, come hide behind my back.

10.chinese: 仿佛变回了小孩子呢……真可爱
10.chineseTL: It's as if you became a little child again... So cute
10.japanese: まるで子供みたい……可愛いわ
10.english: Just like a baby... how sweet.

11.chinese: 无论想要什么，我都可以帮你拿到
11.chineseTL: No matter what it is, I can help you obtain it
11.japanese: ボウヤが欲しいものなら、何でも手に入れてあげるわ
11.english: My child, no matter what it is that you desire, I can help you obtain it.

12.chineseTL: Then, what rewards do you want?
12.japanese: では、どんな報酬がお望み？
12.english: Now then, what kind of reward would you like?

13.chineseTL: Then, let me sing it for you
13.japanese: メールの内容、奏でてあげましょうか？
13.english: Shall I sing the contents of this message for you?

14.chinese: 欢迎回来，无论遇到什么事，都可以向我报告
14.chineseTL: Welcome back, no matter what happened, you can report it to me
14.japanese: おかえり。どんな報告でも聞いてあげるわよ？
14.english: Welcome back. Whether it’s good news or bad news, I’d be glad to hear you out.

15.chinese: 要好好欢迎认真完成了委托的孩子们哟
15.chineseTL: Make sure to nicely welcome back the children that were entrusted to carry out the commission
15.japanese: 委託をこなしてきた子たちはしっかり出迎えてあげないとダメよ
15.english: We must properly praise the girls who have returned from their commissions.

16.chinese: 感觉能奏出更精妙的乐曲了呢
16.chineseTL: Feels like I can play even more exquisite music
16.japanese: より美しい調べが奏でられるわ
16.english: I feel as if I can bring out even more beautiful music.

17.chinese: 聆听我的演奏，献上痛恶、深惧与绝望吧！
17.chineseTL: Listen to my performance and wallow in sorrow, fear and despair!
17.japanese: 調べを奏でよ！憎悪、恐怖、絶望を――！
17.english: Let us play a requiem! Resound, o hatred, fear, and despair—!

18.chinese: 真遗憾，安可演奏还没有开始呢
18.chineseTL: Such a shame, the encore hasn't even started
18.japanese: 残念だわ。アンコールもまだ始まっていないというのに…
18.english: What a pity. The encore had only just begun...

19.chinese: 那么，请静待下次演奏吧
19.chineseTL: Then, please wait patiently for the next performance

21.chineseTL: A little bit more, please be patient
21.japanese: もう少し我慢してあげるわ

22.chineseTL: Have you seriously reflected on yourself?
22.japanese: ちゃんと反省、しているのかしら
22.english: I wonder if you’re properly repenting yet...?

23.chinese: 我是本不应出现的存在，不过，既然我已存在于此，那么其中必然蕴藏着某种合理性…
23.chineseTL: I am a presence that should not exist. But, since I already exist, there must be some rationality behind it...
23.japanese: この身体はこの世あらざるべき 存在。しかしこうして立っていられる以上、なにかしらの理由…合理性が働いているのが必然というものよ
23.english: I never should have come to exist in this world... But since I am here, there must be a higher principle behind it...

24.chinese: 在战场上，勇气并没有意义，谁更接近拉普拉斯的恶魔，谁就更接近胜利
24.chineseTL: On the battlefield, courage does not have a meaning. Whoever is closer to Laplace's demon is the closest to victory
24.japanese: 勇気など戦場では役に立たないわ。ラプラスの悪魔により近づく者だけに勝利の女神が微笑むのよ
24.english: Things such as courage have no value on the battlefield. Only those who approach Laplace’s demon shall approach victory.

25.chinese: 比起战斗，我更喜欢像现在这样，来、张开嘴，啊~~
25.chineseTL: Compared to battles, I like it more like this. Come, open your mouth, aaah~
25.japanese: 戦闘よりこういうのが好きだわ。ボウヤ、はい、あーんして、あーーーん
25.english: I do prefer this to fighting. Here, may child. Open your mouth~ ahhn~

26.chinese: 尽情地向我撒娇吧，更多地、更多地……
26.chineseTL: Feel free to get spoiled until you're satisfied, more, more...
26.japanese: もっと私に甘えてちょうだい。もっと、もっと……もっとよ……
26.english: Please dote upon me more. Yes, more... more...!

27.chinese: 以后，悲伤也好、喜悦也好、痛苦也好、欢愉也好，无论发生什么，都来依靠我吧，我会一直、一直理解你、包容你、支持你的喔……
27.chineseTL: From now on, in sadness, in joy, in pain, in happiness, no matter what happens, you can rely on me. I will always, always understand you, tolerate you, support you...
27.japanese: 悲しいことも楽しいことも、痛さも気持ちよさも、これからは全部分け与えて…ボウヤのこと、ずっと、ずっと、ずっと、包んであげるわよ……
27.english: From now on, I shall share everything with you - your sorrow, your joy, your pain, and and your pleasure. My child, I will always, always welcome you into my embrace...

28.chinese: 偶尔也来向我撒撒娇嘛
28.chineseTL: You can come get spoiled by me once in a while
28.japanese: たまには私にも甘えてちょうだい
28.english: You should let me pamper you once in a while.

29.chinese: 我的指挥无法让你的才能淋漓尽致地展现出来吗……
29.chineseTL: Will my command be able to realize your full talents...
29.japanese: 私の指揮では貴方の力が十分発揮できないかしら
29.english: Perhaps you're unable to display your full power with me in charge?
